el:comments.el:code: Lua 5.1 and XML converted by Leveladministrators

el:protected.el:luamain: -- Environment cells={} cells[","]=cell{floor="fl-gravel"} cells[" "]=cell{floor="fl-space"} cells["#"]=cell{stone="st-invisible"} map_cell_meaning("x", cell{item={"it-wormhole", {targetx="0.5", targety="0.5", range=3, strength=10}}}) level = { ".###################", "#0 x x 0#", "# #", "# x xx x #", "# #", "# ,,,,,, #", "#0 x ,,,,,, x 0#", "# ,,,,,, #", "# #", "# x xx x #", "# #", "#0 x x 0#", "####################" } oxyd_default_flavor = "d" set_default_parent(cells[" "]) create_world_by_map(level) oxyd_shuffle() set_actor("ac-blackball", 10,6.5, {player=0})
